title: Patti LuPone stuns Broadway as The Apologizer
description: On Instagram, Patti LuPone apologized after 500 Broadway artists asked her to stop bullying her fellow artists. The post Patti LuPone stuns Broadway as The Apologizer appeared first on AV Club.
author: Matt Schimkowitz

title: Court is now in session for Saul Goodman V. Jimmy McGill in exclusive book excerpt

title: Big Brother Recap: Who Was the First Houseguest Booted From Season 27?
description: This week in the Big Brother house, Jimmy’s move to try to get Keanu ousted more than blew up in his face. Despite the exhaustive (and very shady) work he put in, when Thursday’s live eviction episode begins, the only “bro” on the block is Zae, and he’s sitting next to Rachel’s bestie Amy and […]
author: Nick Caruso

title: CBS Cancels Late Show, With Stephen Colbert Signing Off Next Year — Watch His Announcement
description: Stephen Colbert is saying goodnight to late night. The Late Show With Stephen Colbert will end a decade-long run on CBS in May 2026, Colbert announced during Thursday’s Late Show taping. Watch his announcement here: The Late Show franchise, which started in 1993 with David Letterman, will be retired as well. “This is purely a financial […]
author: Dave Nemetz
categories: The Late Show With Stephen Colbert
